website_summaries.verdict: A multipurpose set that includes 15 brushes for cleaning bottles and other items of all shapes and sizes. Tops the pack in terms of variety and value.
pros: Set features an impressive number of bottle brushes in various lengths and sizes
Firm and soft tops are also included for scrubbing a wide variety of materials
Even includes an angled brush for baby bottle nipples and a small, slender brush for straws
cons: Some of the handles are on the flimsy side
A few sets arrived with several damaged or broken brushes

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set of brushes. There is a brush for every job. I clean a lot so this set is just what I need. Great customer service too! UPDATE on REVIEW: I first reviewed this without trying the brushes so let me revise my review. It is not a set of brushes for deep cleaning. The stems/handles are very soft and bend, you can get the brush where you need it. It's just to light weight for me. I like strong bristles these are very soft. If you need a set just for light duty this is it. Unfortunately I am returning this set.
customer_reviews.author: CDT5680

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Always the problem with buying a bottle brush is either bringing your bottles with you to the store, or measuring: which still requires a certain amount of guesswork due to brush fluff. I like this set. No matter the size of your bottle, you will likely find something in this set to cover you. Useful.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: a good variety of brushes
customer_reviews.text: These brushes seem to be of good quality and the variety is abundant to meet your needs. I use them to wash out bottles and there are some small enough to clean the inside of plastic straws on water bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Boy Roy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect assortment of cleaning brushes at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: These cleaning brushes are the absolute best! Various sizes mean that I can pick up the perfect one to use when hand washing assorted types of sippy/travel cups. It’s cost effective as well. Will buy again when I run out...there is nothing worse then a grease filled straw and this set has the perfect diameter bristle brush no matter what the job entails.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price, they're great
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I see lots of comments slamming these brushes -- hey people, you get what you pay for. I have only needed to use 4 of these brushes, but I bought the set for only 1. It was a cheap set -- lower your expectations. My brushes were fine & I have had no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Every Bottle Brush I Could Ever Want
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life? All the part of my life since I've had to clean things? So many brushes, so many uses. I wish I had bought this set 10 years ago. My scrubbing life is complete.
customer_reviews.author: Doodeedoo Review

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, quality and as described
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile, hold up well and are useful to clean the bazillion different types of water bottles my family has acquired
customer_reviews.author: Anderchuck

customer_reviews.title: Brushes are good
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly price for so many brushes, big and small ones, one set is almost enough for cleaning every bottles in my kitchen. One pitfall is there is only one brush is sponged. Others are easy to spill everywhere while using.
customer_reviews.author: jing

customer_reviews.title: Great brush set
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the pink/white brush with the white handle, but it is terrific! The offset handle allows you to clean bottle crevices with ease! This is the third bottle brush I've tried (including a silicone bottle brush that did nothing) and I am so glad I gave these a try!
customer_reviews.author: Bene

customer_reviews.title: A big help.  They do such a good job.
customer_reviews.text: It's a lot of useful brushes. Today where we use bottles for everything it's so important to keep the insides clean from bacteria. This kit offers you everything you need to do that. Once you start using them you will rely on them because they are a big help.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic assortment set of brushes
customer_reviews.text: Really a great assortment of brushes. I needed one to clean spa jets, and a small one of little bottles. these work great.
customer_reviews.author: steelbutterfly53

customer_reviews.title: Useful & economical
customer_reviews.text: I have used for plenty of things. For the price & quality it's quite a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Villafane

customer_reviews.title: The best darned brush set I have ever seen!
customer_reviews.text: It seems like every time I need a brush for something, I can't use one of the ones I have! Not anymore! This brush set comes with just about every kind of brush you could possibly need. Durable and dishwasher safe too.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Nice cleaning brushes
customer_reviews.text: These 15 pieces cleaning brushes are awesome, they comes with small brushes and longer brushes for all your needs. I always have hard time to clean my toothbrushing cups and little mugs, and these little brushes works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: As Described
customer_reviews.text: Every size imaginable. At first i thought these were awesome but now I've had chance to use them i find that the handles really need to be longer. If you truly want to get into a wine size bottle to clean it the handle isnt long enough to do it. A beer bottle would be fine but a standard size 750ml bottle cannot be cleaned with any of them. Disappointing. Update: I was contacted by the company after my initial review and they very kindly gave me a refund. I gave 1 more star because of their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra V.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for quality brushes
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I bought this product. I usually don’t bother to rate my purchases but I’m impressed with the variety of brushes and the quality. I especially like that several of the brushes have bristles on the top part not just the metal. It’s quality and a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Madwoman53

customer_reviews.title: Fall apart on first use
customer_reviews.text: Third day using two of the brushes and they are falling apart. See photos. I haven’t used the other ones yet.
customer_reviews.author: Bek

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: One of the brush heads fell out of the handle 3 days into using it. I glued it back together. Not worth sending all the brushes back because one broke.
customer_reviews.author: Livvy Pelliccio

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money I paid.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these several months ago. Some pieces I used daily, others weekly. They're pretty durable and get the job done. I don't use the scrapper on anything other than creases because it's a pretty weak plastic that will ruin fast if I tried to scrap anything with it. I don't use the brown brissled brushes, they're too soft and I have no use for them so for now they sit in my cleaning cupboard. This is a good deal if you're not searching for something of wonderful quality. They get the jobs done that I need them for so it was worth it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Tried three of the brushes They seem to be holding up ok. One of the small brushes with the pink handle had all the bristles fall out before I was able to use . I pulled on all the othe 14 brushes and the bristles were in tight. One bad brush and 14 good. Still a Good Deal. I will update if I find a problem with other brushes.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great assortment of brushes, but some of the bigger ones are a bit flimsy. Weak bristles and the shafts bend easily. If you have something that requires any amount of scrubbing, these are not the brushes you need.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Chritz

customer_reviews.title: Great little set!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a great little set of brushes! It's lasted a long time. there's a few I wish had had a double or triple copy in the set, but pretty much I am happy with the set, and they work very well on all my baby bottles plus a number of other small kitchen things that have needed cleaning over time.
customer_reviews.author: Sam C.

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Love the variety and the price is unbeatable. These are durable and I like that there is different firmness to the different brushes. Do I need 15 brushes? No. Are they good to have for when you never knew you needed a brush for something and you actually have the perfect size for the job? ABSOLUTELY!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolebole

customer_reviews.title: Great brushes for detailing!
customer_reviews.text: Good brushes for a great price. I work detailing vehicles and bought these brushes for vents and/or getting into cracks and crevices. Three of the brushes im using at home for cleaning cups and bottles but the others are perfect for detailing. 1.2. And 3. Im using at home for cleaning cups glasses and bottles. All others in using for vehicle vents, cracks and crevices.
customer_reviews.author: AngelicMom

customer_reviews.title: Cheap made but decent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Original Post: Not the quality I was expecting. I cannot recommend this to anybody. They should work on the quality or stop selling Updates: not sure if I got the bad lot but the quality was not as expected. However, the customer service was great.ree My four star is for the customer support
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money, I bought them and have not used but 2 of them, buy them if you think you will actually use them all, or else you may end up giving them away or buying somewhere to store them
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer71

customer_reviews.title: Good set for price
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Good set to have around, considering the low price point. Used a few different brushes for various tasks already and all have held up well. Would purchase again and recommend others try.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful selection of brushes and a great price.  Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Just opened and love the selection of brushes. I can clean everything and anything with these. And what a great price!! The packaging and little details of the brushes (like individually wrapped brushes and some with extensions) make this a great little gift too. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Raissi

customer_reviews.title: Was not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used all these yet but I was not impressed with ones I have used. I bought to clean hummingbird feeders and bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Rita S

customer_reviews.title: Great selection of cleaning brushes
customer_reviews.text: This collection of brushes comes with a wide variety and is well worth the money. Durability varies, as some are delicate and fine on thin wire handles, but others are sturdy plastic for scrubbing vigorously. Overall, it's a great set and I will buy it again when it's necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Free Nibor

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Handy
customer_reviews.text: I used almost every bottle brush in this set cleaning out old bottles buried in the ground on my property, some of which have a very small opening. For the price, it's a pretty good deal. I imagine the set could be used to clean pretty much every bottle possible.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Russian Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Good all around set
customer_reviews.text: I wish the bristles were tighter and fuller but for the price this is a great all around set. I really only use about 4 of the brushes to clean my hummingbird feeders.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was missing
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited when I got these. Every size I could need. Started right in washing all my water and travel mugs. Cleaned-check Sturdy-check Happy-check and check! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: EEsMom

customer_reviews.title: get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Overall you get a lot for what you pay for as far as cleaning equipment. This is where it ends, the equipment is sub-par and really about as worth as 50 cent brushes at the dollar store. The only brushes we have used thus far have either fallen apart or really too flimsy to apply any kind of cleaning pressure. The best alternative is either soak in hot soapy water, rinse in hot water and let the dishwasher do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Medic

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipment, Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how fast these were delivered! There's so many brushes, which is great! From the tinniest of tiny to clean small funnels, to large bottle brushes to clean condiment bottles!
customer_reviews.author: Melisa R

customer_reviews.title: Good variety
customer_reviews.text: From small to super large, for cleaning toilets, inside small places and pretty sturdy, comes in a handy container.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessie J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning pet's water fountain!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use to clean all the little parts of my cat's water fountain and it works so well! Comes with a huge variety of brushes so you'll always find the one you need no matter what you're trying to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dentite

customer_reviews.title: Great set of brushes and great value
customer_reviews.text: Great set of brushes. I only used a few, but they seem pretty good. Great value for the pack.
customer_reviews.author: Klauss Lundin

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety, definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great set of brushes. Every size and shape. I have 3 different humidifiers and these brushes make cleaning them so much easier. I’ve used some to clean the aquarium tubes. I no longer struggle to get the hard to reach spots clean.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfdog

customer_reviews.title: Great collection of brushes
customer_reviews.text: I've only used a few of the brushes so far, but they appear to be well made and there is a size for everything! I would recommend this collection to others and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B. Hagerman

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I keep rebuying these. They really help with dishes and other cleaning routines. Great for bottles, and dishes. Other things as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Brushes Galore!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set of brushes for just about any situation. I bought them for glass bottle cleaning but with this set, I can clean more than just bottles. This is an awesome set and will fit many cleaning needs in the kitchen and maybe even things around the house.
customer_reviews.author: KayDee

customer_reviews.title: they fit!
customer_reviews.text: just what I wanted to clean vintage bottles..all sizes and cleaned great
customer_reviews.author: jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Eh. Does the job..... UPDATED*
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are mediocre. The various sizes tackles a ton of different crevices and bottles, although they are not made with great quality, as they are a bit flimsy. * SELLER HAS BE IN CONTACT WITH ME AND SOLVED MY PROBLEM WITH MY SATISFACTION!! 😊
customer_reviews.author: I LOVE KUD

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the price for the amount of brushes you get
customer_reviews.text: You get a Brushes for everything imaginable they’re not real stuff so if you’re looking for a stiff brush your wanna look further but if you’re looking for a variety of brushes that can tackle just about every project these are the ones
customer_reviews.author: Darlene E Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Such a variety.
customer_reviews.text: We made this purchase with cleaning my baby’s bottles in mind . We use dr. Browns colic bottles and they have like 6 parts per bottle & to clean them is such a hassle. This set has everything you need & more .
customer_reviews.author: Dominica

customer_reviews.title: Decent variety of uses for whatever you need scrubbed
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad set of brushes. Different sizes and variety so you can use them to clean more than just your dishes. You should give these a shot and see for yourself of what I’m talking about
customer_reviews.author: TBEAR91

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning baby bottle products.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect variety of sizes for cleaning all types of bottles. Bought for baby bottles and I’m very happy with the variety of sizes and shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Ligress

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety
customer_reviews.text: This multi pack is nice since I can always find something that works to clean odd items. I have a humidifier that is super annoying to clean and these helped a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Clean Anything with Ease
customer_reviews.text: So many different cleaning tools that you should be able to clean what ever crevice needs cleaning. I always find it tough to clean humidifiers or self circulating pet water dishes and this works great!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan J. Trask

customer_reviews.title: Soft Bristles
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a product to do some scrubbing this in not the kit. These are all soft bristled. I was a little disappointed. I needed them to clean my meat room equipment and my rotisserie. I will find uses for them but, I get to start back at square one on what I was initially looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set when my husband asked me to find some decent bottle brushes. Now he keeps pointing out how he uses this or that of the various brushes in his hobby work. He's tickled with their versatility which makes me tickled as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Wundring

customer_reviews.title: A Brush for every need
customer_reviews.text: It's good to have a variety of sizes of brushes. Cleaning bottles, etc., is much easier when you have the right length and size brush/

customer_reviews.title: Just about everything you could need
customer_reviews.text: The sizes range from very narrow to the "usual" bottle brush size. I use them daily and am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ASONGBIRD

customer_reviews.title: Impressive assortment
customer_reviews.text: Great variety and high quality. You'll always find the perfect brush for the task in this set. I bought this for washing dishes, but I'll get another set for the garage. I used the small black brush to deep clean my dishwasher. It worked like a charm and it didn't break or rust.
customer_reviews.author: BeachBum

customer_reviews.title: Perfect brushes for many jobs.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and seller. Every size and shape needed to get the job done around the home. Thank You. I will recommend them to everyone. Thank You

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I needed. A size for everything. I couldn't find what I wanted in the stores. Good price too.

customer_reviews.title: Brushes
customer_reviews.text: I use these for everything, they are great. packaged well, came on time. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Janet A.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Items came quickly and as described. Nice variety of cleaning options. Is helping me reuse many types of bottles and reduce my waste in a clean and healthy way. Happy with purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Great Set of Brushes
customer_reviews.text: There are more brushes than I know what to do with. Very sturdy and should last for a few years. I am very pleased with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Brushes
customer_reviews.text: The brushes included in this set are all quality brushes. I have found a need for nearly every one. They came packed in a sturdy box, and could be given as a gift. Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure if I really needed this many brushes. I find, however, that there is such a wide variety of uses. The wide straws. My bird feeders (my original purpose). Anything tall and skinny.

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: Says food grade but made in China. Someone’s not being honest here

customer_reviews.title: Variety set, you might not use them all.
customer_reviews.text: The 360 brush is handy, but is the most fragile. Forcing it into smaller openings will cause it to bend, rust, and break.

customer_reviews.title: Bushes
customer_reviews.text: Different size combo of brushes. Can use for multiple items. I like the small brushes, they fit in the small place that are hard to reach when washing with regular sponges. Happy with item.

customer_reviews.title: good assortment but most are very soft brissles
customer_reviews.text: Great assortment of brushes , just wish the some brushes had stiff brissles..for instance the small brushes to use for cleaning jewelry..

customer_reviews.title: A brush for every thing.

customer_reviews.title: what i needed
customer_reviews.text: they may life so much easier. wish i had them forever ago

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and great value for so many brushes!
customer_reviews.text: These brushes work so great for cleaning small areas like in my pets water bowl where it’s hard to clean. There are so many for a lot of different uses! Such a great value and their customer service is amazing and so very kind!!

customer_reviews.title: A brush for every job!
customer_reviews.text: Love theses brushes! There’s one for every job - great selection of sizes!

customer_reviews.text: If a brush isn't in this set, you don't need it.

customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to wash baby bottles with. They are so nice, and theres so many brushes that I can wash in both my bathrooms and the kitchen.

customer_reviews.text: Bought these for baby bottles, sippy cups, and all thing baby and toddler. They have done so well, it was shocking how much was left behind before I got these brushes. They get into the smallest of nook and crannys. Love the variety of brushes.

product_meta.title: 15Pcs Food Grade Multipurpose Bottle Brushes for Cleaning,Cleaner Brush,Include Straw Brush|Bottle Brush|Blind Duster|Pipe Cleaner,Small,Long,Soft,Stiff Kit for Baby Bottle,Nipple,Tube,Jar,Bird Feeder
feature_bullets: 【FOOD GRADE & BPA FREE】Safe for baby bottles and glassware. Contains NO harmful chemicals. Process is simpler and less cumbersome for cleaning baby bottles, reusable straws, juicers, jewels, water bottles, bongs, and pet fountains. You can find a million uses for them. Make you enjoy your cleaning chores!

【15 VERSATILE BRUSHES WITH A BLIND DUSTER INCLUDED】 The widest selection you can find on the market. Even comes with a blind duster for air vent and window blind. Clean any tiny corner that is hard to get into by hand. The different sizes are ready for different tasks all the time. Makes the job easier and faster!

【VARIETY OF HARDNESS & SIZES】Use stiff brushes for some heavy duty scrubbing. Use softer brushes so you won't scratch something delicate that needs a lighter touch. Quickly clean any mess without leaving behind any unsightly surface damage. Different tools available for every nook and cranny!

【BENDABLE & ANTI-RUST HANDLE】Unlike other stiff plastic handles, our flexible handle can be bent and shaped to work around corners easily. Made of 18/8 anti-rust stainless steel for lifetime use. Every tip of the brush has a plastic protective cap, so it won’t scratch the surface.
